title: The One That Shall Not Be Named

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, pick a Role to place a Curse on.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The day after you use your ability, the first person to say the Cursed Role's name, post number, or command in the day chat will be converted to that role.
- Your conversion cannot change someone's goal if they are part of an informed minority, and their new role isn't. But it can make someone turncoat from one evil faction to another.
- You cannot Curse unique roles, Town Powers, Factional Leaders, 822, 733, or any role that cannot be copied according to ‚Å†rasen-rules.
- You win with all players you convert, and they are able to win together regardless of their current alignments.
- The conversion occurs immediately and targets of it will be notified that they can win with role 822.
- If you win, other factions will not win.
- Basic Defense
- 733 Immunity

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Ensure that the only living players are ones you converted using your Curses. You may fulfill this dead or alive.
